title: Celebrate Golden Week and National Day with fireworks at Mandarin Oriental, Hong KongTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Celebrate Golden Week and National Day with fireworks at Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong
Mandarin Oriental, Hong Kong offers some of the city’s best viewpoints for the spectacular National Day fireworks display to be held on 1 October 2015 . Rather than joining huge crowds on the streets to watch this illuminating show, guests can celebrate in luxury high above Hong Kong whilst enjoying either an exclusive Fantastic Golden Week stay or dining in the hotel’s top-floor restaurants.
Valid from 26 September to 1 October , Fantastic Golden Week package includes:
One night accommodation in a Harbour Room with views overlooking Victoria Harbour (and the spectacular fireworks display on October 1 only) Available on October 1 only, enjoy a complimentary bottle of Ruinart Champagne Complimentary in-room Wi-Fi internet access Breakfast for two in Clipper Lounge
Rates start from HKD4,900 exclusive of 10% service charge. Additional special celebratory menus will be available for orders through in-room dining.
Boasting outstanding views over Victoria Harbour from the 25 th floor, both Pierre and Man Wah will provide tempting menus for diners to enjoy whilst they admire the fireworks display. If guests wish to watch the action whilst enjoying a glass of chilled champagne or crafted cocktails, the stylish M bar is the ideal location or for family gatherings, while Clipper Lounge offers a feast to celebrate the festivities.
